item.name: Titanheart's Ring
entries: Creatures you restore hit points to gain a {@dice 1d4} bonus to attack rolls and saving throws, and are resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, until the end of their next turn.

item.name: Lunarvitra Arrow

entries.name: Magic Ammunition
entries: This magic ammunition gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls. It is destroyed on use, dealing the weapon's ordinary damage (unless otherwise specified) and the additional effect below.
This arrow ignores bonuses to AC granted by spells or magical items, unless that spell or magical item is directly created by an Artifact or a Deity.

Targets hit by this arrow have any magical effects (such as {@spell Mage Armour|PHB} or {@spell Bestow Curse|PHB}) on them suppressed until the start of your next turn. Creatures with an antimagic susceptibility, such as {@creature Animated Armour|MM}, must follow the text in that condition, but only suffer its effects until the start of your next turn.
